name: df-mea
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cmea, cab(s0, wa(wa(wa(wf(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cdm(cv(s0)), csalg)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0)), wral(s1, cpw(cdm(cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cfv(csumge0, cres(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
comment: Define the class of measures. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
